description:

The Figure Eight Zipper Bracelet is a very elegant design featuring repeating circles. It comfortably fits a range of wrist sizes. 

approximately 7" x 2.5"

this very dimensional bracelet will stand out about .75" from the wrist

fastens with hidden magnetic snaps that are inscribed with Kate's signature

name: Zipnyl Bracelet
description:
READY TO SHIP: order by 12/18 to ensure it will arrive in time for Christmas

The Zipnyl Bracelet is the newest design from Kate Cusack. It features a strip of the metal teeth of a zipper encased in a clear vinyl tube. This is a fun, edgy bracelet with a modern, sleek look. Opens with a magnetic barrel clasp.

Looks great in a group of three or just one. Mix and match colors or create a group of the same color. (Red/Silver shown in photos)

Available in two sizes: 
- average: measures 7.5"
- small: measures 6.5"

For larger sizes, please contact Kate for a special order. 

+++++++++++SPECIAL OFFER+++++++++++
A small collection of early prototypes of this design are currently available for a discounted price. These prototypes are functional and fabulous, but may have some (tiny) flaws. Enter discount code ZIPNYLSAMPLE at checkout to receive 50% off. 

This offer only applies to the regular size in the following colors: 
- black/gold
- red/gold


2013 © Kate Cusack

Shipping:
-International shipments are sent via Express Mail which includes tracking information.
-Domestic shipments are sent via Priority Mail.

name: Band Cuff [B07]
description:
The "Chic Punk" Band Cuff bracelet is made from metal zippers. It is a very wearable, urban style which can be worn by men or women. 

approximately 7.25" x 2.5"

fastens with two magnetic snaps for a secure fit

black fabric with shiny-gold (plated brass) metal teeth

can also be made with black fabric and gold (brass) teeth or black fabric and shiny-silver teeth

name: Braid Zipper Necklace [black/silver]
description:
READY TO SHIP: can arrive in time for Christmas

The Braid Zipper Necklace is a new direction for Kate Cusack which features only the metal teeth of the zipper braided together with shiny black cording. A decidedly "fashion-forward" approach to statement jewelry. This is a hand-made one of a kind Zipper Necklace.

features the metal teeth of silver (aluminum) zippers braided with black cord

measures 18 inches around when clasped and measures about 1.75 inches wide

name: Zipper Lace - Fleur
description:
Elegant, one of a kind necklace in Kate's new technique: Zipper Lace. 

This necklace features the metal teeth of the zipper-- with the fabric of the zipper removed. The effect is a lace-like, easy to wear necklace that brightens up any blouse or dress. 

Brass zipper teeth


Zipper Lace - Fleur © 2012 Kate Cusack

Shipping:
-International shipments are sent via Express Mail which includes tracking information.

Elegant, one of a kind necklace in Kate's new technique: Zipper Lace.

name: Zest Brooch - Medium
description:
Introducing Zest Brooches - the latest in Zipper Jewelry from Kate Cusack. These dynamic pins feature only the metal teeth of the zipper without the fabric portion. Each Zest Brooch is unique: varying in size and complexity. The Zest Brooches are an elegant burst of energy and creativity. 

The Zest Brooch measures approximately 3" by 3." 

It fastens with a 1.5 inch pin-back with a safety clasp.


Original Zest Brooch design
